message.body: I txted Will but no response. I can make it tomorow, but I don't remember the address
Heard! Let me know
Till what time?
Going straight to the studio, so should be there the rest of the evenin!
Forever!
Love that, I'll be there as i can
Captain! Is 11 too late? Should I bring something?
Allright I doubt I find anything open though... Is front and what street?
Nope! Come come! Er, I have some beer here but bring whatever you like!
Front and girard, and no worries! Plenty o miller high life
Sorry Cap, duty keep me longer than expected, crazy day. I'm better at cooking. Let me know next working day at the studio. Have fun
No prob! I'm there every day, so if yr ever bored, come visit!
Allright, but be noted that I'm not going out of boredom. I'll let you know :)
Hey, will you be at the studio tomorrow? I want to stop by even for a bit, I'm quite curious. If not and you have time you can join me for dinner w some
friends. I'm cooking
Sorry, dinner is on thrusday, forgot to mention that haha
I will be at the studio around 6, not sure if I have time for dinner, but we'll see!
Ok, def can't do dinner on Thursday, have rehearsal, but stop by tomorrow and I'll put you to work!
I'll be there at 7 +-
K, I have to step out at 7 for ten mins, so 7:15 should be fine
I got soaked before even make it outside. I'm starting to think that there is a bigger that pushes m away
Yr missing out on some quality paper mâché, that's all I'm sayin :-)
I just dry out, I'll give it a second shot
I'm not worry I do want some mache
Son bromas! Don't worry bout it'
I'm taking thr subway now
Thanks again for the assistance! So good to see you again!
Lovely time indeed. Nice to met your boyfriend and musician friends. Very interesting people. We will do it again soon. Animo!
How are ya! Any news from will? I had no luck reaching him so far. I hope your project is coming along, ask me if you need anything. Take care
No :-/. I've sent him a few txts/calls, but no response....has he not been at marigold? Hope he's alright....everything is going great! You should come by on Saturday if yr around for helper party!
Restaurant is closed till next week. I'll try to show up tomorrow. See ya
Cool, see ya then!
Hey, you mind if I go w a friend? What time is it?
Haha ok till what time you'll ve there?
We've been partying since 5, but we're still here if you and friend want to come over!
Haha will be next time then, I'm sure sometime soon
Dunno... Prolly another hour?
Kk!
Had to work today, I imagine everything went awesome. Congrats
Thanks!!
